title: Hyperbaric oxygen therapy for Alzheimer's disease

title_detail.value: Hyperbaric oxygen therapy for Alzheimer's disease

summary: Researchers have the first PET scan-documented case of improvement in brain metabolism in Alzheimer's disease in a patient treated with hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT).

summary_detail.value: Researchers have the first PET scan-documented case of improvement in brain metabolism in Alzheimer's disease in a patient treated with hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT).
